title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
EB: If no webapps are deployed on the Tomcat 7 instance and a URL is accessed, the server should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL
4. Observe that the server returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
